name: Wave Attack
description:
First Game Project done in 1 weeks time with Unity.

For a casual good time.

Features:

  • 5 Unique enemy types
  • increasing enemies each spawn wave
  • Infinite upgrades to weapons 

Enemy Spawns:

  • Enemy type 1 from 0 points
  •  Enemy type 2 from 1000 points
  • Enemy type 3 from 2000 points
  • Enemy type 4 from 4000 points
  • Enemy type 5 from 8000 points

Upgrades:

  • +10 Health = -50 points
  • Increase missile fire rate = -300 points
  • Increase missile Damage = -500 points

 Third-Party Asset credits(All from the Unity Asset Store):

  • Space Shooter Free (DINV STUDIO)
  • Universe Sounds Free Pack (MARCIN KLOSOWSKI)
  • Simple Spaceships (3DJEEBS)
  • Dynamic Space Background Lite (DINV STUDIO)
  • Eerie Apocalypse Music Pack (ALEKSI AUBRY-CARLSON)
  • Unity Samples: UI (UNITY TECHNOLOGIES)
